name: JJ Hiew
title: Co-founder
description: Former CTO at [Merscient Inc](http://www.merscient.com). 10+ years as a web developer and architect. B.Sc in Computer Science from U of T.

name: Ben Zelikovitz
title: Co-founder, Advisor
description: Currently serves as Director at Sitescout. Ben has 10+ years of experience in Enterprise SaaS sales and recruitment. Ben is one of our advisors.

name: Disco Stu
title: Chief Scientist
description: Disco is the most diligent scientist we know, always testing the laws of gravity.
